## Anatomy of a task
```
task BwaMem {
  input {
    File input_fastq
    String base_file_name
    File ref_fasta
    File ref_fasta_index
    File ref_dict
    File? ref_alt
    File ref_amb
    File ref_ann
    File ref_bwt
    File ref_pac
    File ref_sa
    String taskDocker
  }
  command <<<
    set -eo pipefail

    bwa mem \
      -p -v 3 -t 16 -M \
      ~{ref_fasta} ~{input_fastq} > ~{base_file_name}.sam 
    samtools view -1bS -@ 15 -o ~{base_file_name}.aligned.bam ~{base_file_name}.sam
  >>>
  output {
    File analysisReadyBam = "~{base_file_name}.aligned.bam"
    
  }
  runtime {
    memory: "48 GB"
    cpu: 16
    docker: taskDocker
    walltime: "2:00:00"
  }
}
```
